photo.capture: My Bin Pet is the best!

fun_moment.text: The time Gab didn’t realise she was still on the air and burped!

about.fun_fact: His unique antennae make him easy to spot in a crowd!
about.text: This sharp-witted newshound is the editor of the most popular mag, Weevil Weekly. Wherever there’s a scoop to be found, Scribbles is there on the double with his notepad and pencil, frantically scribbling down the facts – which is exactly how he got his nickname!
